message: I think we might've overdone it...
I look at Noiz with concern, but there's only a feverish euphoria in his eyes.
Noiz averts his eyes for a moment, then gives me a gentle peck on the lips before looking me in the eye again.
I have to look away. It's too embarrassing.
Still, at least he's being honest...
Noiz smirks. He's clearly getting off on my reactions.
Turning away to hide my embarrassment, I lift my hips and extract his member.
I gasp as I feel him slide free...
...and then I feel something drip down my thigh.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Shit... I need something to wipe this up..."
He offers me a tissue box. I pull one out, feeling his gaze on me.
I flick him right in his smarmy little forehead and grab a few more tissues.
There's a sizeable blob of white on Noiz's stomach. I can't believe that's mine...
I start to wipe, but it's hard with him squirming.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey, sit still. I'm trying to clean you."
...A hot lump rises in my throat.
He's smiling. Laughing. I've never seen that before.
Noiz is staring at me. When I get up to throw away the tissues, our eyes meet.
After seeing him smile like that, I can't help myself. I pull him toward me and give him a gentle kiss.
Noiz looks a little annoyed, but his grin comes right back.
I never used to know what he was thinking, but now his expressions are rich and vibrant with emotion.
It makes me really happy to see.
Those peaceful days go by in a flash, but that happiness never dims.
